original_text: So he went in and out among them at Jerusalem, preaching boldly in the name of the Lord.
korean_text: 사울이 제자들과 함께 있어 예루살렘에 출입하며

sentences.original_text: So he went in and out among them at Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 예루살렘에서 그들 가운데 드나들었다

sentences.original_text: preaching boldly in the name of the Lord.
